description: This Dart file defines a responsive layout widget named BaseScaffold, which provides a top navigation bar, side navigation for wide screens, and bottom navigation for smaller screens. It manages navigation items based on user roles and integrates with application state management via providers.

classes.name: BaseScaffold
classes.description: A responsive scaffold widget providing top bar, side or bottom navigation, and dynamic menu items based on user roles.

classes.name: _TopBar
classes.description: An AppBar widget showing the application title, role label, notification icon, and user menu.

classes.name: _SideNav
classes.description: A side navigation panel with a list of navigation items, displayed on wider screens.

classes.name: _BottomNav
classes.description: A bottom navigation bar with navigation destinations, displayed on narrower screens.

classes.name: _NavItem
classes.description: A simple data class representing a navigation item with label, icon, and route path.

methods.name: _navItems
methods.description: Generates a list of navigation items based on user roles.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Overrides StatelessWidget build method to construct the responsive layout.

methods.name: _roleLabel
methods.description: Determines the user's role label for display.
